1.content:
Welcome to shrink high! Here is an discription



This school is ruled by the velvet gloved iron fist of the Dean. She holds ultimate authority over important issues, and only defers specific decisions to her specialists, such as: the Assistant Dean of Security - Currently being filled quite well by the Student Proctor; medical decisions are left to Dr. Brand - School Physician, who theoretically could tell the Dean respectfully to step down if she is a danger to the school or herself - this has never happened and is an unlikely event; and the Director of Espionage, who may identify a clear present danger to the school and take action. Yet the Dean does hold final power in the background, reinforced by the knowledge that her ultimate size dwarfs all others.

Second to the Dean are the above mentioned offices, usually acting only in their own areas, but able to step in if she is ill.

The administration area also includes detention cells, usually reserved for external tinies who are awaiting decision upon their fates, but occasionally used to punish or control recalcitrant students. The detention center is jointly overseen by: the school Nurse, who insures that no cruel behavior is given without the Dean's approval, and that detainees are healthy - It's rumored that she can make being detained a sheer joy...or hell; the Student Proctor only reviews the facility if there are currently student detainees, and the head of security, checks for safety..

The Health Center is staffed 24/7, by either the Nurse, Dr. Brand, or medical graduate students, who perform triage in off hours while the Dr. and Nurse are on call. If Dr. Brand is working alone, a senior class giantess assists him. Facilities exist to treat almost everything, and are as advanced as any hospital in the world. Common treatments are accidental swallows, smashes, poison bites and stings, and other animal bites, and gym injuries. Psychological assistance is also given freely for the homesick and lonely.

The espionage center is for classified eyes only and not to be discussed at this time.

First up who are you?
1.title: Welcome to Shrink High

11.content:
Zero was woken up by the giant alarm clock and he starts to yell, "Sarah its morning time to wake up!!"

Sarah stirred in her sleep. "Five more minutes." She rolled over her hand blinding reaching for the alarm clock. Eventually hitting the snooze button.

Zero yells, "sarah you know what will happen... wait its saturday! why did you tell me to set the alarm last night sarah?!"

Sarah sat up slowly pushing off her blanket relieving herself only in her bra and panties. "Fine, fine Eric." She let out a yawn and wiped the sleep from her eyes. "So did you have a nice rest last night? I know I did." She giggled.

Zero sighed, "yeah i did but your friends were kinda crazy last night well then again it was friday and we just finished the midterms."

Sarah laughs lightly thinking about last night. "That party did get wild didn't it. And just think we might just be doing that again tonight!" Sarah rolled out of bed.

Zero says, "well providing the student president doesn't stop you."

"Don't worry so much Eric I'm sure it will be fine." Sarah smiled and picked him up making her way to the bathroom. "I'm sure she will understand that we need to party on the weekend. How else are we going to relax after a hard week of studying and tests."

Zero says, "Yeah i hope atleast."

Sarah sets Eric down on the sink counter. "Now be a sweety and turn the water on." She pointed at the small whole in the wall leading to the controls.

Zero says, "Of course Sarah!" he then goes into the hole and starts to press buttons and the sink turns on. He yells, "its on!"

"Thanks! Now come on out lets get to brushing our teeth." She placed her tooth brush on the counter and squished a bit of toothpaste onto it. "There you go just take your portion like usual."

Zero comes out of the hole with is tooth brush and he takes some of the toothpaste off Sarah's tooth brush and says, "thanks for waiting for me today!"

"I always wait for you silly. You just fall behind sometimes." She roughs up his hair a little and laughs a bit. Sarah then starts to brush her teeth. Once she was ready her and Eric would head out and maybe grab a bit. She didn't really feel much like laying around in the dorm on such a nice day.

Zero starts to brush his teeth and Asks, "so what ya planning on getting at the cafe for breakfeast today for us? After want to go out to the park?"

Sarah spit out her tooth paste then began to take her underwear off. "Sure I'd love a good walk around the park after breakfast." She then placed her open hand on the counter for him to climb on so they could take their shower.

Zero spit out his tooth paste and then climbed onto Sarah's hand and says, "alright!" he was wearing swim trunks.

Sarah climbs into the shower places Eric in his tiny shower right next to her. "Again would you help a big helpless girl like me get the water on." She put a finger on her lip giving him puppy dog eyes.

Zero blushed as he ran to the panel but he sleeps and fell off his tiny spot and starts to fall towards the drain of the shower.

Sarah was on the floor of the shower in an instant Eric in hand. "You need to be more careful I don't want you getting hurt." She says as she hugs him ligthly. She the puts him back up near the panel. "Now take it slow."

Zero blushed during the light hug. This time he slowly walked to the panel and started to press the buttons. He was embarrassed that he slipped and needed rescueing again.

"Ahhhh! Thanks bunches!" She blew him a kiss as warm water came down on her.

Zero jumped into the shower and started cleaning up.

Sarah finish's up her shower and grabs up Eric as he finishes up as well. She takes him to the bedroom and set out some of his cloths as well as her own. She quickly gets dressed and ready to go.

Zero gets dressed in a black muscle shirt and jeans. He says, "lets head to the cafe then sarah!" He turns to look at Sarah and blushed, "You look absolutely Stunning today!"

"Awww thanks." She gives him a 'small kiss' then picks him up. She places him on her shoulder letting him use her hair to keep himself stable. "Well lets head out." She smiles at him and exits the dorm.

Zero carefully grabs some of Sarah's hair and says, "alright lets go!"
11.title: Sarah and Zero

111.content:
Sarah set Eric down on a empty table. "I'll be right back with breakfast." She walked off and ordered some bacon, scrambled eggs, and blue berry pancakes. She then made her way back taking a set in front of Eric setting their food next to him. "Mmmmm that smells good!"

Zero smiled and says, "Yeah it does Sarah! Oh the leash thingy don't forget to put it on me!" He smells the food.

Sarah hits her self on the head. "O, ya stupid me." ^.^ She quickly walks over to the small receptacle filled with the harnesses and picks a dark purple one. She places it next to Eric as she sits down. "There ya go safety first." Sarah then cuts up some food for him and slides it to his side of the plate.

Zero puts the leash on himself and says, "Thanks for cutting my food for me Sarah!"

Sarah munches away on the food in front of her. Every once an awhile she can't help, but let her eyes move over to Eric. She watched him eat the food still much larger then him. She giggled, it was so cute.

Zero blushed and asked, "You not gonna ask me THAT again like usual during mealtime?" he finished up his pancake.

She giggled lightly and swallowed. "Well if your willing to do it this time I might." A small grin was stuck on her face. (We all know where this is going)
111.title: Cafeteria

choices: Continue on Sarah's Point of View
Continue of Zero's Point of View
1111.content:
Zero says, "well i guess we can do it this one time then Sarah!"

Sarah just smiled. "Thank you so much. I'll try and find a way to pay you back for this." She picks him up and places him on her pancakes.

Zero yells, "Becareful not to cut the leash!" He then started to move around in the sea of syrup which to sarah looked like i was swimming.

Sarah licked her lips watching her new little morsel swim across her pancakes in a sea of syrup. She cut around him then placed the string on her finger. Her fork sunk into the bit of pancake he was on and lifted it up.

Zero tried to steady him self as sarah lifted her fork into the air. He says, "okay i think i'm ready for this..."

Sarah licks her lips she knew this bite was going to be the best she'd have all day. She slowly placed him and the bit of pancake in her mouth and sucked it off the fork. "MMMmmmmm!"

When the piece of panacake and zero entered Sarah's mouth the leash started to glow abit. He looked around sarah's cavernous mouth and says, "Well this isn't so bad!"

Sarah moved Zerp around for a few minutes letting him get nice and soaked in her saliva. "Time to go down." She smiled as she tilted her head back and swallowed.
1111.title: Zero Agrees

11111.content:
It was an extremely nice feeling, to feel Zero's minute body decend down her throat. Sarah had always had a fetish of swallowing things. In fact, since she was young she had swallowed pennies, quarters, and once her dad(all men in this world are tiny). Of course, she had to puke him up again.

However, even now she still had dreams about this, and now it was happening again. She was so excited, she could scream, and even in the 13 second interval Zero's body fell she had already had 2 orgasms. Finally, she felt Zero enter her stomach, making her have a massive orgasm, before remembering that she shouldn't close her mouth, lest she bight the leash in 2.

After 5 minutes in pure bliss feeling John squirm, she noticed that he became silent. Every logical part of her brain told her to check it, but at that time a group of girls suddenly came up to her and started to talk to her.
11111.title: Continue on Sarah's Point of View

choices: Zero is alive, but burnt very badly by acid
chunks of scared flesh and bone, Zero was dissolved
111111.content:
Sarah, feeling concerned about Zero, since she loved him very much, and since she never was a social person, politely excused herself from the surrounding girls, and there tiny boys. Running to an forlorn table at the edge of the huge cafeteria, Sarah pulls the leash out of her mouth, only to find a burned off end splattered with crimson blood.

This greatly distressed Sarah, since she still wanted Zero be her friend, so she ran as fast as she could to the bathroom(imagine what it would be like in the stomach) yelled, "Zero, can you here me?"

Due to Zero's small size, of course she couldn't. Frantically, she try to make herself puke, but after swallowing so many things, Sarah had no gag reflex. Frantically, she runs to nurse who gives her syrup of ilbec. Soon after, she pukes up a disgusting mixture of HCL and mixed food, while she frantically looks for the body of her friend. It had been 15 minutes since she swallowed Zero.
111111.title: She checks on Zero

choices: Sarah Checks on Zero and Sees the Burned Away Leash
Sarah Checks on Zero after 20 minutes but Zero is gone
11112.content:
Suddenly, Zero felt himself move to the back of the mouth where a gaping hole could be seen through the thin illumination of the leash. Seconds later, he found himself falling down the hole, before being messaged by surrounding muscle as he fell through through the throat. However, a mere 13 seconds later, the journey ended, and he felt himself falling into a much bigger pit.

Through the faint light the stomach looked the city dump when it was last flooded. Pieces of gunk in various sizes floated through toxic water(HCL), and was completely soaked. Before his eyes the food slowly broke into different parts. To make it even worse, random contractions in the pit caused tsunami size waves to go through the stomach. The air surrounding him was stank very badly, and lacked oxygen, making Zero feel very dizzy. Looking around the boundaries of the pit, he could see small streams of clear water(pure hydrochloric acid) trickle down from the sides of the stomach, which appeared to be covered with a pure coat yellowish clearish gunk.

Finally, Zero hit the bottom, and immediately everything started to burn. Within seconds, most of his skin was gone. Frantically, Zero pulled the leash, only to find it had basically been eaten away. Using the last of his strength, and thanking the gods for him falling close to the edge of the stomach, he pulled himself to the sides of the stomach, which was a hard task, since the stomach was covered with mucus, and climbed into the pits in the sides of the stomach. Quickly he rested there, and rubbed himself with mucus before he was soon shaken off from the pit, falling back into the carosic acids. Luckily, with the mucus, the acid didn't burn as much, though it stank a horrible smell, worse than the city dump. However, time was running out for Zero, as the mucus soon lost its protection.

However Sarah was oblivious to Zero efforts, as he had only been in her stomach for less than 5 minutes.
11112.title: Continue of Zero's Point of View

choices: Zero is stuck to the Wall
111121.content:
Soon, the painful burning started again, first in his extremities, before progressing its way throughout Zero's body. Already, many parts of Zero's body were deeply burned, and each part was gushing out blood.

If this continued, Zero would soon die of blood loss, if the acids didn't get him first. Already the pain was beyond describing, and Zero's muscles were spasing out of control. Soon, as Zero loses control of his legs, he slowly started to sink into the merciless pool of acid, by now his mouth filled with a vile liquid beyond describing.

By now, Zero had given up all hopes of surviving through this ordeal, and hoped that his demise would soon happen, so that he could escape this world of punishment. Luckily for Zero, (Or unluckily), a sudden strong convulsion in the stomach combined with a strong 10 foot wave sent Zero crashing into one of the indents in the wall, smearing him with sticky mucus and saving him for now, though Zero was bleeding profusely now, and streams of scarlet blood mixed with a rainbow other colors flowed from Zero and slowly fell, forming a waterfall to the bottom of the stomach.

Just when Zero decided that he would use his remaining dwindling strength to end his misery, he suddenly realized that the faint glow from the leash had disappeared, and realized that Sarah was checking on him. Suddenly, he could hear a muffled voice sound ask if he was okay. Zero, much to weak to even talk(and even if he did he wouldn't be heard), just stood there. Suddenly, he could hear another gagging sound: immediately the world became chaotic as Sarah started running.
111121.title: Sarah Checks on Zero and Sees the Burned Away L...

1111211.content:
Luckily for Zero, the mucus was very sticky, and Zero didn't fall down. However, as Sarah ran to the bathroom, Zero was shifted around as the stomach itself moved a little, further injuring Zero. Fortunately, the mucus helped stench the flow of the bleeding, though it might cause blood poisoning later.

Finally, after excruciating martyrdom(suffering), the torture finally ended, as Sarah abruptly can to a halt. Now that the leash in the stomach was gone, Zero couldn't see much due to the disappearance of the leash(also due to his eyes burning from the acid), but he was pretty sure he was at the top of the stomach, close to the splincture. Thanks to the coarosic acid Zero couldn't smell as well, but Zero still had trouble not puking at the abhorrent smells prevailing across the stomach, which had gotten ten fold worse, as digestion had gotten underway.

After a tentative relief, the running started again, and the pain was worse than ever, as more and more of his nerve endings recovered there feelings. Suddenly, Zero was hit by a foul smelling stinky liquid above, which cause him to once again fall into the sea of acids, which was now boulder free, though isolated clumps of mostly broken up food could still be seen. This foul smelling liquid caused the stomach walls to tremble violently, and shake in many waves, before Zero found himself forced up, as the stomach had a massive contraction. Soon he was forced up the slimy tube he had fallen down from, along with half a gallon of stomach acid.

Finally, he felt himself enter a cavern which opened, revealing blinding white light. Seconds later, he hit the cold metal surface of the table with moderate impact(contrary to most beliefs, if you fall from the head of a person at ant size, you will not be hurt, in fact, if you fall from the empire state building, you still wouldn't be hurt, due to air resistance). Though normal people could have survived this, Zero, at his weakened state, passed out, and the last thing he saw was the face of the nurse staring at him with ________ .
1111211.title: Zero is stuck to the Wall

choices: Docter and Nurse and the Prize
11112111.content:
"Looks like he has gone through a beating. Good thing I bought that mini medical set." said the nurse. The nurse then faced Sarah and told her to carry Dr. Brand here.

"How badly is he injured?" said Sarah as she walked away.

"Looks like he might lose a arm or two, and he's going to need to a few pints of blood. Might have sensory problems, and we're going to have to discuss his punishment for worrying you. Looks like he's also going to have quite an array of scars, if he manages to pull it off." replied the nurse.

"Please don't hurt him, I beg of you." said Sarah sadly, before she disappeared behind the corner.

Minutes later, Sarah hurried over with the tiny Dr. Brand and his equipment, and immediately he started working in a frenzy before asking "I'm getting my prize for helping him, right Nurse Carolina?"

After thinking for a while, she finally replies "Yes, I guess."

Immediately Dr. Brand started working at Zero with renewed vigor, as the nurse had promised him he could explore any part of her body he wanted.

Over time, Dr. Brand redressed Zero's broken bones, put acid burn cream on his skin(this was quite common at this school), and gave him blood, and tried to the best of his ability to fix Zero's sensory organs, such as his eyes.

Meanwhile, the nurse gave Sarah an experimental anti digestion cream, which would raise the PH of the stomach temporarily.

Soon, Zero was fixed up as best as the doctor could, and was put into the time accelerator, which worked by making the machine run a lap at the speed of light.

After 2 days (3 months to Zero), the machine came to a stop, and Zero came out saying "Well, its nice to see people after so long of an isolation."

"I'm so sorry" said Sarah, with tears rolling down her curved face, as she hugged him tightly around her chest, before setting off for her next class, Biology, with Zero(Doesn't Zero have great timing? Wakes right when the first class in Monday starts).
11112111.title: Concern

111121111.content:
Since Zero had been isolated for "3 months", Zero was not in a very talkative mood, even with Sarah sobbing to herself. After a silent 5 minute walk, Zero and Sarah arrived at there class, right before the bell rang.

Today in biology, they were talking about the human anatomy, and in particular, they were talking about intercourse between males and females(what an odd school :D)

The first thing that was talked about was how men got tiny. Legend said that 300 years before, scienctists were studying what would happen if a human had two y chromosomes. Instead, a lab accident formed a what was though be deadly bacteria that targeted the y chromosome and altered it. The odd thing was that although it was thought 100 percent of men were infected, nobody showed any side effects. However, it was discovered that the male offspring were incredibly small.

As years past the question of reproduction was asked. Finnally, tiny male scientists and their female comrades invented a ray that could grow and shrink a person's size. So, DNA was extracted from males, enlarged, and then given to females. It was found that although males could shrink and change size it was impossible to increase the size of a male beyond his mature height(4 inches).

Over the years, females gradually took advantage of the small size of males. Some of them found that they could now easily make their husbands do whatever they wanted them to do. Some swallowed there husbands alive, others enjoyed shoving up their anuses, and many other things.

Now that the introduction was complete, the professor than started in great depth into each of the different types of enjoyment. The first type of sexual pleasure was called vore. This was when the female swallowed a male whole(usually). However, do to the toxic conditions in the stomach, males must be regurgitated in less than 30 seconds to ensure safety(Sarah's face turn bright red).

Of course this was a very short time, but things continued this way for over 200 years, before our discovered a liquid that rose the PH of the stomach, ensuring survival in the stomach for a longer time.

"Now class, on my table I have several vials of anti-digestion liquid, I would like you guys to drink this, and experiment swallowing your male partner or dorm mate. If you do not want to do this, it is okay, just raise your hand.
111121111.title: Sarah and Zero

choices: Next lesson: how to train your male
1111211112.content: The boys were terrified when none of the girls raised their hand. "Now ladies." the professor said. "Your slave may get slightly burned from this activity." she said. "With that being said, it is important to remember that because you are ladies, your pleasure comes before a gentleman's pain" she said with a hint of mockery in her voice. Sarah and the other females drank the liquid on their desks and put their helpless males on each of their tongue. "Ok girls." the professor said. "Swallow your male." Sarah then shallowed Zero and the other girls did the same with the boy in their mouth. Zero and the other boys heard the girls laughing at their expense when they were trapped inside their stomachs. Zero was angry and Sarah, but was turned on about being a helpless slave to a beautiful goddess of a girl. After about ten minutes all the males were regurgitated. "Our next lesson class." the progress or said is...
1111211112.title: Zero has bad luck

11112111122.content: "...how to train your male." she said. "As women, we are superior to men and therefore need to obey us." she continuted. She walked to her desk and came back with a set of remote controls and a miniature bag with very tiny collars in it. "Now ladies." she said. "We all know that the best way to get a man to obey us is by threatening his vulnerable manhood." she said with smile. All of the girls giggled and the boys were frozen with fear. "That is why today we are going to test the Ballbusters on these boys today." "Now I want each male to strip down and I will pass out the Ballbusters to each of you." "The device will be locked permanently on your balls gentlemen for your lady to use on you outside of the classroom, so it is not wise to anger your mistress." "And ladies I want you to take control of your slave and his manhood and torture it as you please." "They are only men after all." she said with a little laugh. She passed out the Ballbusters and the males stripped and the girls locked the device on their slave's balls. Sarah smirked at Zero with the Ballbuster remote in her hand. Zero and the other males looked up at their mistresses' with terror and were looking for some sympathy. "Ok girls, there are five settings on the remote 1 being the lowest amount of pain and 5 is highest amount pain, which for a male I have been told is the equilivent of a swing of a golf club to the nuts ." the teacher said. "The first setting I want you to use on your male is...
11112111122.title: Next lesson: how to train your male

choices: Zero falls into Sarah's Stinky Tennis Shoes
112.content:
Skipping breakfast,Sarah goes directly to the park, carrying Zero in her thick, lush, dark hair. The black forest was very nice smelling, since Sarah just had a shower that morning, though Zero remembered times when the black forest wasn't that good, with flaky dead skin the size of plates, and even once a few insects(lice).

Suddenly, Zero shivered, remembering the time someone had shrunk him even more, and he had fallen in the pores of the hair. It was a horrible experience, since the roots of the hair always had this bad smell, and to make it worse, the pores were covered with dead skin.

On the walk there, the hair shifted constantly, but since Zero had been with Sarah quite some time, he was used to it, and could easily hang on, though it was quite humiliating to have to hold on to a strand of hair to stay on.

During that time , Zero also thought about Sarah. Sarah was a very cute girl, who was extremely athletic. She was approximately 1000 ft tall(5 foot 7 inches), and had a huge butt and breasts. She had light hazel eyes, and had a very big mouth, both physically and socially. In fact, Zero thought Sarah was perfect in every way, except that she didn't wipe very well, and had very stinky feet.

Suddenly, Zero is yanked out of his muse, as Sarah came to an abrupt halt, causing Zero to lose his grip.
112.title: Park

choices: Sonia Aggrees, They go to the Cafeteria
Sonia is Angry, They Go to the Cafeteria
Sonia is Angry, Biology, she's hungry
12.content:
"C'mon Sonia get up. We're going to be late!"

The alarm was not getting her up and he had squirmed out of her bra.

In desparation, he moved to her ear, kneeling over it.

"sonia..." he Whispered. Nothing

"Sonia..." He called out

"SONIA!" he yelled in her ear, and had to grab onto her hair as his attempts finally worked.


"GUAHHHH!" Sonia screamed, waking up. "What?! Why'd you wake me up?!" she said to Jake.

"Sonia, they close the cafeteria early today, it'll biology class. You can't skip this one, active participation is 80% of the grade. I really need something to eat and drink.

I also heard that they are offering that lactose inducing formular to students in bio today... I don't know if you've thought about feeding me that way..." He blushed.

"Anyway, it we don't get down there now, I'm going to be so hungry...and so will you... I'd really really rather not have a testy, low blood suger giantess as a a lab partner... I know you try to be gentle with me, but I don't want to push it... also, I hear the chef made croissants and vanilla eclairs... Can you please just pull on some clothes and we'll get down there. We aren't supposed ot shower until after bio anyway."

He hugged himself to her neck. He knew she was a heavy sleeper and not a morning person, but he really needed her to get moving. "I'm so sorry I had to wake you early, you looked so peaceful and gorgeous lying there sleeping...now you just look gorgeous...and maybe a bit peeved."

He grinned winningly at her. "It's cold out this morning, can I ride in your shirt?"
12.title: Sonia and Jake

info.brief_description: A place where tinies and giantesses attend school
info.description:
Tired of looking around for a perfect story about shrinking people? You've come to the right place. Welcome to Shrink High where regular sized girls attend high school with tiny males.

No size changing, ending the story is OK, no hard vore, guys are tiny, girls are big, please add if you view this story. Other than this everything is fine.
